mapper.insert: insert into tb_purchaseitem(no, name, price, produce_date, purpose, standard, section_code, factory_code, insert_userid, insert_day) values(#{no }, #{name }, #{price }, #{produce_date }, #{purpose }, #{standard }, "001", #{factory_code }, "aaa", now())
insert into tb_factory(no, name, address, manager_name, insert_userid, insert_day) values(#{no }, #{name }, #{address }, #{manager_name }, "001", now())
